bibl.title: P. Mich. 6973: The Text of a Ptolemaic Fragment of Euripides' Cresphontes.
bibl.note: I. Introduction: 1. General Introduction; - 2. Features of the Michigan Papyrus (inv. no. 6973) [Fayum (?), II B.C.]; - 3. The Arrangement of the Fragments of the Two Papyri [P. Mich. Inv. 6973 and P. Oxy. XXVII, 2458 (= M.-P.3 436; LDAB 967)]; - 4. On This Edition. - II. Text. - Voir aussi: Katherine Lu Hsu, P. Mich. 6973: An Interpretation of a Ptolemaic Fragment of Euripides' Cresphontes, ZPE 190 (2014) pp. 31-48.
bibl.seg: Katherine Lu Hsu, P. Mich. 6973: The Text of a Ptolemaic Fragment of Euripides' Cresphontes.

I. Introduction: 1. General Introduction; - 2. Features of the Michigan Papyrus (inv. no. 6973) [Fayum (?), II B.C.]; - 3. The Arrangement of the Fragments of the Two Papyri [P. Mich. Inv. 6973 and P. Oxy. XXVII, 2458 (= M.-P.3 436; LDAB 967)]; - 4. On This Edition. - II. Text. - Voir aussi: Katherine Lu Hsu, P. Mich. 6973: An Interpretation of a Ptolemaic Fragment of Euripides' Cresphontes, ZPE 190 (2014) pp. 31-48.
